sections.heading: burning ban; range-management burning; violations; penalty
sections.text: Any person violating the statewide open burning ban established by section 81-520.01 or violating sections 81-520.03 to 81-520.05 shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1980, LB 810, § 3;Laws 1989, LB 19, § 1;Laws 1994, LB 408,

81-520.02.Open burning ban; range-management burning; violations; penalty.

Any person violating the statewide open burning ban established by section 81-520.01 or violating sections 81-520.03 to 81-520.05 shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 1980, LB 810, § 3;Laws 1989, LB 19, § 1;Laws 1994, LB 408, § 2.
